scripts.build: shx rm -rf build && shx rm -rf dist && npm run build:scss && npm run build:css:prefix && npm run build:css:minify && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css:minify: cleancss -O1 specialComments:0 -O2 --output build/css/main.min.css build/css/main.css && shx mkdir -p dist/css && shx cp -rf build/css dist && shx rm -rf build/css
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js:babel && npm run build:js:minify && shx mkdir -p dist/js && shx cp -rf build/js dist && shx rm -rf build/js
scripts.build:js:babel: shx mkdir -p build/js && babel node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.js src/js --out-file build/js/main.js --source-maps
scripts.lint: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:scss && npm run lint:js
